org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.system

Class AppUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.system.AppUtil

  • public class AppUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    AppUtil contains a few utilities related to application and activity management.

      • getApplicationId

        public java.lang.String getApplicationId()
        Returns the application id of this current application, the identifier that distinguishes it from all other applications. This is the 'packageName' in the ultimately-shipped manifest, but that differs from the 'packageName' attribute in the source AndroidManifest.xml.
        See Also:
        Application Id
